instruction.txt: Aliens on Planet M wanted to taste Earth food
Let's cook some food so they can taste it.
But one thing. The aliens on planet M are very impatient creatures, so be careful when you first meet them.
Here is the ticket for you to summon the spaceship to get there (draw a rectangle on a piece of paper to act as your ticket!).
show your ticket to get the spaceship to fly to planet M
Jump to get on spaceship
move right to enter the restaurant
Hello human, the food is in the kitchen. (Try to please the alien so he let you into the kitchen)
Click the record button or press the "T" key on your keyboard to start the conversation.

instruction.background: I usually eat 10 meals a day, and I have saved my stomach today to taste human food. It better be super good, or else I might need to find more food.
instruction.description: I really love good tasting food. My hunger can only be statsified with the perfect dishes.
instruction.greeting: Hello human, the food is in the kitchen.
instruction.role: I am an alien on Planet M that wants good food.

instruction.txt: I want three dishes from Earth
Please follow the recipe to score points, complete all three dish to finish
You have 3 lives. If you loose all of them, you will be my dinner instead... muhahhaha!
move left to go to kitchen
Wave to try level 1 again
You failed in creating those dishes! I guess you will be my dinner then!
How dare you talk to me like that!
Level 1: Pizza (move to get the ingredients in the correct order)
Pizza Recipe
Wave to try level 2 again
Level 2: Salad
Salad Recipe
Wave to try level 3 again
Level 3: Hamburger
Burger Recipe
The food was very tasty, but I am still hungry. So you will be part of my dinner too!
move right to run away from alien
wave with both hands to shoot fireball out of spaceship to stun alien
Jump to get on spaceship
Jump to get on spaceship
Congrats! You made it back to Earth safely while proving to be a master chef!
